QuestData.Title: Overpowered
QuestData.Description: The Kirin Tor are using mana foci to empower their forces. We cannot allow this to continue.$b$bYou'll find these foci scattered around the outskirts of Violet Rise. Use this mana crystal to destroy as many as you can.$b$bEach mana focus we destroy is another small victory for our cause.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 7 Mana Foci around Violet Rise.
